venue.name: Bear and Grill Restaurants in Orange

item.description:
Summer’s coming, so let’s get it rolling with a happy hour Meetup with your friemds from Party Express! The Bear & Grill has food and drink specials * and Tom “The Captain” Ferrara (one of our members) will be playing his selection of classic acoustic rock starting at 5:30 PM. As this is a public venue, feel free t o bring a friend or co-worker to enjoy the music – the more, the merrier!

* Happy Hour specials are:
     $4 22oz Beer. $4 Martini,
    $2.50 Bud lite, Miller lite, Coors lite.
    1/2 price Apps.

P.S. – I greatly appreciate the continued support I receive from my MeetUp friends. Thank you.
